name: The Fall
journalEntry: I seem to have fallen down a hole.  My leg is badly lacerated. I need to find something to stop the bleeding.
doc: This is an example of a randomly generated map.  The 'mapWidth' and 'mapHeight' properties define the size of the map.  The 'objects' property is used to place objects on the map.  The 'count' property is used to define how many of each object to place on the map.
